channel.title: Buzzing on Quora
channel.description: 用中文浏览Quora上的热门回答

item.title: How can you hack the hiring process to get the job I really want? Former Bachelorette contestant and author of 'Restart Roadmap', @Jason_Tartick, shares his best advice. https://t.co/TuPr9dw39m https://t.co/O66DVvfM74

How is it possible that, after all that Ferdinand and Imelda Marcos did throughout their political history, their son Bongbong Marcos is now about to win the presidency in the Philippines? Quora contributor Jean-Marie Valheur summarizes: https://t.co/wynqYj4xxB

The cleverness of the human species has resulted in such wonderful diversity of architecture. Via the Wonders of the Past Space, we learned about HÓRREOS, a traditional structure on the Iberian peninsula of Spain and Portugal.
